snippet: Charlie Beljan became an instant hero to the perpetually anxious late last year when he suffered a panic attack on the golf course before earning his first PGA Tour victory.
abstract: Charlie Beljan became an instant hero to people who suffer from anxiety late in 2012 when he suffered a panic attack on the golf course before earning his first PGA Tour victory.
lead_paragraph: Charlie Beljan became an instant hero to the perpetually anxious late last year when he suffered a panic attack on the golf course before earning his first PGA Tour victory.

headline.seo: Charlie Beljan Lives a Life of High Anxiety and Low Scores
headline.main: A Fun-Loving, Carefree Spirit Becomes the Face of Anxiety
headline.print_headline: A Fun-Loving, Carefree Spirit Becomes the Face of Anxiety
